InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: Revenant Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 4

If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it. And if you want it broke, aim a Revenant at it. Solidly built on a foundation of centuries-old tech, Apocalypse Arms puts an innovative spin on battle-tested designs to create a rugged ballistic Gatling that can steadily hurtle death across the void. Though it’s slow to spin up and cool down, the Revenant’s dependability makes it a favorite for those expecting to find trouble.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:

Size: 3

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-313 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 1xS3

Behring’s MSD-313 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S3 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Thunderbolt III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic 
Size: 3

Thanks to the Firestorm Thunderbolt's agile frame and EM targeting system, this proximity missile is a solid choice for a wide variety of combat scenarios.

InstalledItem.Name: FR-66
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Military

The FR-66 is one of the most versatile small shield generator currently on the market. Get military strength protection and performance from Gorgon Defender Industries to ensure your ship can survive any onslaught.

InstalledItem.Name: QuadraCell
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Military

Few military-grade power plants get better than the Aegis QuadraCell. It wasn’t just built to survive the heat of battle, it was built to thrive in it.

InstalledItem.Name: Glacier
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Military

Your weapons, your shields, your thrusters. All vital during combat, all generating heat. Enter the Glacier cooler from Aegis Dynamics. A best-in-class heat management system designed to keep you cool as the pressure mounts.

InstalledItem.Name: Glacier
InstalledItem.Description:

InstalledItem.Name: Rush
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: ArcCorp 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Rush is a popular commercial quantum drive that lives up to its name.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.
